post.description: Create a new instance of tags

parameters.name: body
parameters.description: New or partial resource

get.description: Get a specific instance of tags

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: id of specific instance to lookup

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: id of specific instance to lookup

parameters.name: body
parameters.description: New or partial resource

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: id of specific instance to lookup

ipAddressPlc.description: The IP address of the plc.

macAddressPlc.description: The MAC address of the plc.

history.description: History table for storing timestamped tag values.

timestamp.description: The Unix time in milliseconds of the tag.

value.description: The current value at the timestamp time of the tag.

dataQuality.description: Can only be OK or Bad

tagId.description: The tag this history is for.

locals.description: Represents the tags local to an RPP or a DP.

ipAddressPlc.description: The IP address of the plc.

macAddressPlc.description: The MAC address of the plc.

ipAddressHost.description: The IP address of the linux host.

macAddressHost.description: The MAC address of the linux host.

cabinetNum.description: The cabinet number of 1 - 35 or rpp.

rackNum.description: The rack number of 1 - 5 or local

isWritable.description: Can you write to this tag.

isEnabled.description: Is this tag enabled. If false, then the tag will be ignored.

isHistorical.description: Should we store historical data for this tag.

divider.description: The tag value scaling factor to convert from raw counts to eng units.

modbusAddress.description: The modbus address for this tag, must be an integer.

value.description: The current value of the tag in engineering units.

lastUpdate.description: The last time the current value was updated in UNIX time (ms).
